alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dallam and Hartley Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 448 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northeast of Romero, or 18 miles southwest of Dalhart, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Channing and Romero. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. Theis type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
